cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the Senate Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on July 28, 2021.
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2946, Reinforcing Nicaragua’s Adherence to Conditions for Electoral Reform Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 2946.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3 (d) (1) of rule XIII of the Rules of
the House of Representatives, the Committee finds the
authority for this legislation in article I, section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H2135]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: RENACER Act
